essay.question: Describe the design and functionality of the object.
essay.answer: The object is a small, cuboid-shaped desk calendar made primarily of wood. It features an anime character with yellow hair on the top section, which adds a decorative and playful aesthetic. The main function of the calendar is to display and record the date using a manual flip block system. Users can rotate the numbered blocks to update the date manually. The calendar is bilingual, featuring both English and Chinese text. Additionally, its compact size makes it portable, and its sturdy wooden construction ensures durability. The calendar also has a subtle light feature around the character, making it visually appealing in low-light settings.
